info.title: IAM Service API
info.description: Identity and Access Management Service - Authentication, Authorization, RBAC, Menu Management, Organization Structure

get.summary: ListAuditLogs lists audit logs with search, filter, and pagination.
ExportAuditLogs exports audit logs to Excel for compliance.
GetAuditSummary gets audit statistics for dashboard.
GetAuditLog retrieves a single audit log entry.

post.summary: Disable2FA removes two-factor authentication.

Enable2FA initiates two-factor authentication setup.
Returns a TOTP secret and QR code URL.
Verify2FA confirms 2FA setup with a TOTP code.
ForgotPassword initiates password reset by sending OTP to email.

Login authenticates a user with username and password.
Returns access token, refresh token, and user info.
Note: Any existing session will be revoked (single-device policy).

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: LoginRequest is the request for user login.

post.summary: Logout invalidates the current session.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: LogoutRequest is the request for logout.

get.summary: GetCurrentUser returns the authenticated user's info.

post.summary: RefreshToken exchanges a refresh token for new access/refresh tokens.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: RefreshTokenRequest is the request for refreshing tokens.

post.summary: ResetPassword sets a new password using a valid reset token.
UpdatePassword changes password for authenticated user.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: UpdatePasswordRequest changes password for authenticated user.

post.summary: VerifyResetOTP validates the OTP code and returns a reset token.

parameters.name: activeFilter
parameters.description:
- ACTIVE_FILTER_UNSPECIFIED: Show all records regardless of active status (default).
 - ACTIVE_FILTER_ACTIVE: Show only active records.
 - ACTIVE_FILTER_INACTIVE: Show only inactive records.

parameters.name: menuLevel
parameters.description:
Filter by menu level.

 - MENU_LEVEL_ROOT: Level 1: Root menu (e.g., Dashboard, Finance)
 - MENU_LEVEL_PARENT: Level 2: Parent menu (e.g., Master, Transaction)
 - MENU_LEVEL_CHILD: Level 3: Child menu (e.g., UOM, Parameter)

parameters.name: parentId
parameters.description: Filter by parent ID (null/unset for root only).

parameters.name: activeFilter
parameters.description:
- ACTIVE_FILTER_UNSPECIFIED: Show all records regardless of active status (default).
 - ACTIVE_FILTER_ACTIVE: Show only active records.
 - ACTIVE_FILTER_INACTIVE: Show only inactive records.

post.summary: Reorder menus within same parent

get.summary: Get menu tree for current authenticated user (filtered by permissions)

parameters.name: serviceName
parameters.description: Filter by service name (optional, returns all services if empty).

get.summary: Get full menu tree for admin management (not filtered by permissions)

parameters.name: cascade
parameters.description: If true, also delete all child menus. Otherwise fails if has children.

post.summary: Menu-Permission assignment

post.summary: Role-Permission assignment

get.summary: ListActiveSessions lists all currently active sessions (admin only).
GetCurrentSession returns the current active session info.

post.summary: RevokeSession force logs out the user (admin can revoke others).

get.summary: ListUsers lists users with search, filter, sort, and pagination.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search query (searches in username, email, full_name, employee_code).

parameters.name: activeFilter
parameters.description:
Filter by active status.

 - ACTIVE_FILTER_UNSPECIFIED: Show all records regardless of active status (default).
 - ACTIVE_FILTER_ACTIVE: Show only active records.
 - ACTIVE_FILTER_INACTIVE: Show only inactive records.

post.summary: CreateUser creates a new user (admin only).

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: CreateUserRequest creates a new user with employee details.

get.summary: ExportUsers exports users to Excel file.

parameters.name: activeFilter
parameters.description:
Filter by active status.

 - ACTIVE_FILTER_UNSPECIFIED: Show all records regardless of active status (default).
 - ACTIVE_FILTER_ACTIVE: Show only active records.
 - ACTIVE_FILTER_INACTIVE: Show only inactive records.

post.summary: ImportUsers imports users from Excel file.

get.summary: DownloadTemplate downloads the Excel import template.
GetUser retrieves a user by ID.
GetUserRolesAndPermissions gets all roles and permissions for a user.
GetUserDetail retrieves user with full employee details.

post.summary: AssignUserPermissions assigns direct permissions to a user.
RemoveUserPermissions removes direct permissions from a user.
AssignUserRoles assigns roles to a user.
RemoveUserRoles removes roles from a user.

tableName.description: Table name for CRUD events (null for auth events).

recordId.description: Record ID affected (null for auth events).

v1AuditLog.description: AuditLog represents a single audit log entry.

validationErrors.description: List of validation errors if any.

isSuccess.description: Indicates if the operation was successful.

v1BaseResponse.description: BaseResponse is the standard response wrapper for all API responses.

v1EventType.description: EventType represents the type of audit event.

v1HourlyCount.description: HourlyCount represents event count by hour.

totalItems.description: Total number of items across all pages.

v1PaginationResponse.description: PaginationResponse contains pagination metadata for list responses.

field.description: The field name that failed validation.

v1ValidationError.description: ValidationError represents a single field validation error.

v1AuthUser.description: AuthUser contains basic user info for authentication context.

requires2fa.description: Whether 2FA is required (return true if 2FA enabled but totp_code not provided).

totpCode.description: Optional TOTP code if 2FA is enabled.

v1LoginRequest.description: LoginRequest is the request for user login.

v1LoginResponse.description: LoginResponse is the response for successful login.

refreshToken.description: Refresh token to invalidate (optional, if not provided uses current session).

v1LogoutRequest.description: LogoutRequest is the request for logout.

v1LogoutResponse.description: LogoutResponse is the response for logout.

v1RefreshTokenRequest.description: RefreshTokenRequest is the request for refreshing tokens.

v1RefreshTokenResponse.description: RefreshTokenResponse is the response with new tokens.

newPassword.description: New password (min 8 chars, must contain uppercase, lowercase, number).

v1TokenPair.description: TokenPair contains access and refresh tokens.

qrCodeUrl.description: QR code URL for authenticator apps.

v1UpdatePasswordRequest.description: UpdatePasswordRequest changes password for authenticated user.

resetToken.description: Reset token for password reset (valid for 10 minutes).

menuTitle.description: Cannot change parent after creation (use reorder for moving).

v1ActiveFilter.description:
ActiveFilter represents filter options for is_active field.

 - ACTIVE_FILTER_UNSPECIFIED: Show all records regardless of active status (default).
 - ACTIVE_FILTER_ACTIVE: Show only active records.
 - ACTIVE_FILTER_INACTIVE: Show only inactive records.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the record was created (ISO 8601).

updatedAt.description: Timestamp when the record was last updated (ISO 8601).

updatedBy.description: User who last updated the record.

parentId.description: Parent menu ID (optional, null for root level).

menuUrl.description: Route URL path (optional for parent-only menus).

sortOrder.description: Initial sort order (optional, auto-assigned if not provided).

permissionIds.description: Initial permission IDs to require for this menu.

deletedCount.description: Number of menus deleted (1 + children if cascade).

v1GetFullMenuTreeResponse.description: GetFullMenuTreeResponse returns the full menu tree for admin management.

v1GetMenuTreeResponse.description: GetMenuTreeResponse returns the menu tree for sidebar navigation.

rowNumber.description: Row number in the Excel file.

v1ImportError.description: ImportError represents a single import error.

parentId.description: Parent menu ID (null for root level).

menuUrl.description: Route URL path (null for parent-only menus without links).

isVisible.description: Whether the menu is visible in sidebar.

isActive.description: Whether the menu is active (can be toggled without deletion).

v1MenuLevel.description:
MenuLevel represents the hierarchy level of a menu.

 - MENU_LEVEL_ROOT: Level 1: Root menu (e.g., Dashboard, Finance)
 - MENU_LEVEL_PARENT: Level 2: Parent menu (e.g., Master, Transaction)
 - MENU_LEVEL_CHILD: Level 3: Child menu (e.g., UOM, Parameter)

requiredPermissions.description: Required permission codes to view this menu.

v1MenuWithChildren.description: MenuWithChildren represents a menu with its child menus (for tree view).

parentId.description: Parent ID (null for reordering root menus).

menuIds.description: Ordered list of menu IDs in their new order.

v1OrganizationNode.description: OrganizationNode represents a node in the organization tree.

permissionCode.title:
Permission code format: {service}.{module}.{entity}.{action}
e.g., finance.master.uom.view, iam.user.create

actionType.title: Action type: view, create, update, delete, export, import

v1ModulePermissions.description: ModulePermissions groups permissions within a module.

actionType.title: view, create, update, delete, export, import

roleCount.title: Number of roles with this permission

userCount.title: Number of users with this role

v1ServicePermissions.description: ServicePermissions groups permissions by service and module.

v1Session.description: Session represents an active user session.

UserServiceAssignUserPermissionsBody.description: AssignUserPermissionsRequest assigns direct permissions to a user.

UserServiceAssignUserRolesBody.description: AssignUserRolesRequest assigns roles to a user.

UserServiceRemoveUserPermissionsBody.description: RemoveUserPermissionsRequest removes direct permissions from a user.

UserServiceRemoveUserRolesBody.description: RemoveUserRolesRequest removes roles from a user.

v1AssignUserPermissionsResponse.description: AssignUserPermissionsResponse is the response for assigning permissions.

v1AssignUserRolesResponse.description: AssignUserRolesResponse is the response for assigning roles.

v1CreateUserRequest.description: CreateUserRequest creates a new user with employee details.

v1CreateUserResponse.description: CreateUserResponse is the response for creating a user.

v1DeleteUserResponse.description: DeleteUserResponse is the response for deleting a user.

v1GetUserDetailResponse.description: GetUserDetailResponse is the response for getting user details.

v1GetUserResponse.description: GetUserResponse is the response for getting a user.

v1ImportUsersResponse.description: ImportUsersResponse is the response for importing users.

v1ListUsersResponse.description: ListUsersResponse is the response for listing users.

v1RemoveUserPermissionsResponse.description: RemoveUserPermissionsResponse is the response for removing permissions.

v1RemoveUserRolesResponse.description: RemoveUserRolesResponse is the response for removing roles.

v1RoleWithPermissions.description: RoleWithPermissions contains role info with its permissions.

v1SectionInfo.description: SectionInfo contains section with hierarchy info.

v1UpdateUserDetailResponse.description: UpdateUserDetailResponse is the response for updating user details.

v1UpdateUserResponse.description: UpdateUserResponse is the response for updating a user.

isActive.description: Whether the user account is active.

allPermissionCodes.description: All unique permission codes (combined from roles and direct).

v1UserAccessInfo.description: UserAccessInfo contains roles and permissions for a user.
